languages.text: "Я не мог бы просить о большем. Все, чего я хочу — остаться под сводами этого корабля и наблюдать в почтении деяния великого духа. Да прервется Цикл!"
"I could not ask for more. All I wish is to remain in these halls and observe in reverence the great spirit's deeds. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"
languages.original_text: "Я не мог бы просить о большем. Все, чего я хочу — остаться под сводами этого корабля и наблюдать в почтении деяния великого духа. Да прервется Цикл!"

traits.locale_text: "I could not ask for more. All I wish is to remain in these halls and observe in reverence the great spirit's deeds. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

traits.locale_text: "I could not ask for more. All I wish is to remain in these halls and observe in reverence the great spirit's deeds. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: 「これ以上望むことはない。私の望みはそこに残り、偉大なる精霊の行いに敬意を込めて見守ることだけ。サイクルを断ち切れ！」
languages.original_text: "I could not ask for more. All I wish is to remain in these halls and observe in reverence the great spirit's deeds. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: 「これ以上望むことはない。私の望みはそこに残り、偉大なる精霊の行いに敬意を込めて見守ることだけ。サイクルを断ち切れ！」
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: “我不敢奢望更加仁慈的判决。我唯一的愿望就是留在这里，怀着崇敬之心观察这位伟大机魂的事迹。让循环终止吧！”
languages.original_text: "I could not ask for more. All I wish is to remain in these halls and observe in reverence the great spirit's deeds. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: “我不敢奢望更加仁慈的判决。我唯一的愿望就是留在这里，怀着崇敬之心观察这位伟大机魂的事迹。让循环终止吧！”
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Mehr könnte ich nicht verlangen. Ich wünsche nur, in diesen Hallen zu bleiben und ehrfürchtig die Taten des großen Geists zu beobachten. Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde!"
languages.original_text: "I could not ask for more. All I wish is to remain in these halls and observe in reverence the great spirit's deeds. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: "Mehr könnte ich nicht verlangen. Ich wünsche nur, in diesen Hallen zu bleiben und ehrfürchtig die Taten des großen Geists zu beobachten." Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde!"
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: « Je ne pouvais pas rêver mieux. Je ne souhaite qu'une chose : rester en ces lieux et observer avec respect les actes du grand esprit. Que le cycle soit rompu ! »
languages.original_text: "I could not ask for more. All I wish is to remain in these halls and observe in reverence the great spirit's deeds. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne pouvais pas rêver mieux. Je ne souhaite qu'une chose : rester en ces lieux et observer avec respect les actes du grand esprit. Que le cycle soit rompu ! »
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: «No podría pedir más. Lo único que deseo es permanecer en estas estancias y contemplar con veneración la obra del gran espíritu. ¡Que se interrumpa el Ciclo!».
languages.original_text: "I could not ask for more. All I wish is to remain in these halls and observe in reverence the great spirit's deeds. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: «No podría pedir más. Lo único que deseo es permanecer en estas estancias y contemplar con veneración la obra del gran espíritu. ¡Que se interrumpa el Ciclo!».
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek

languages.text: "Başka da bir şey istemem. Tek dileğim, bu koridorlarda kalarak yüce ruhun eylemlerini hürmetle gözlemlemektir. Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun!"
languages.original_text: "I could not ask for more. All I wish is to remain in these halls and observe in reverence the great spirit's deeds. Let the Cycle be discontinued!"

traits.locale_text: "Başka da bir şey istemem. Tek dileğim, bu koridorlarda kalarak yüce ruhun eylemlerini hürmetle gözlemlemek. Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun!"
traits.speaker: Ch04_Malatek
